name: 🆃🅷🅴🅰🆃🅴🆁 - The Game
description:
Contribute technical feedback at its discord server: https://discord.gg/2AdXwwh4Ye

WHAT DOES THEATER INSTALL?

- A Comedy Mystery Scenario

- Character Templates and Custom Designer

- Story Engine and Relationship Simulator

- An excuse to contemplate humanity

WHAT DOES THEATER NOT INSTALL?

- Your unique imagination

- Humans to create Scenarios you play 

- Humans to applaud your (superior) Scenarios

- Accurate behavioral simulation

WHAT DOES THEATER INSTALL ... IN FUTURE VERSIONS?

- Fully featured Scenario, Scene and Location editor interface

- Dozens of pre-made Scenes and Scenarios

- Scene genres Contemporary, Cyber, Retro, Renaissance

- Distilled awesomeness

For more view https://www.facebook.com/theaterthegame
